attributes.action: link MP’s pay and benefits to the those enjoyed by average UK citizens
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Future governments would then be better connected with the 'real world' and so make wiser decisions.

MPs pay could be a multiple of the UK average pay and their pension arrangements reflect the average pension. No more voting themselves special arrangements. 

They could also undertake to use the NHS, education services and public transport without any special privileges

rejection.details: This petition overlaps several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/mp-payrises/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
